ComicInfo.Summary:
Very first wraparound cover poster this prog.
Wraparound cover: Brian Bolland and John Burns (Tharg the Mighty and the cast of 2000AD)
Judge Dredd - Christmas Comes to Des O'Connor Block (John Wagner - Mick McMahon - Tom Frame)Ro-Jaws - The Inside Story (Pat Mills - Kevin O'Neill- John Aldrich)The Stainless Steel Rat - Stainless Steel Rat (part 5) (Kelvin Gosnell - Carlos Ezquerra - Jack Potter)The Mind of Wolfie Smith - Night of the Carnivore (part 13) (Tom Tully - Vanyo - John Aldrich)Captain Klep - Lord Klep (part 4) (Dave Angus - Robin Smith)Black Hawk (part 17) (Alan Grant - Ramon Sola - Peter Knight)Notes:
The cover is a homage of the movie Close Encounters of the Third Kind.
